description: Try our easy to follow Lamb Koftas recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Lamb Koftas Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place mince, onion, garlic, parsley and spices in a bowl. Using clean hands, mix together until combined and sticky.

Divide into 8 equal portions. Form into sausage shapes and insert a skewer through the centre. Heat a chargrill pan over high heat. Brush with oil. Cook koftas, turning occasionally, for 8-10 minutes or until charred on all sides and cooked through.
To serve, spread Lebanese bread with hummus and tabouli, top with kofta and add a squeeze of lemon juice.
